thread.title: BRIEF-New West Energy Services Inc. Announces Equity Position Of Financing Partner

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-New West Energy Services Inc. Announces Equity Position Of Financing Partner

organizations.name: announces equity position of financing partner new west energy services inc

text:
New West Energy Services Inc:
* NEW WEST ENERGY SERVICES INC. ANNOUNCES EQUITY POSITION OF FINANCING PARTNER
* NEW WEST ENERGY SERVICES - REACHED AGREEMENT WHERE NATIONS EQUIPMENT FINANCE WOULD ACQUIRE EQUITY STAKE IN CO
* NEW WEST ENERGY SERVICES INC - WILL ISSUE TO NATIONS 11.8 MILLION SHARES IN LIEU OF REPAYMENT OF $1.2 MILLION OWING BY NWE TO NATIONS
* NEW WEST ENERGY SERVICES - UPON CLOSING, NATIONS WOULD HOLD ABOUT 27 PERCENT OF COâ€™S OUTSTANDING SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
